Articles.Content:
Established orbit around Minmus as usual, but when I separated from my main engines and deployed my landing struts, only 3 lowered. I hit G again to bring them up and try again, but as the 3 lowered ones reset themselves, the stuck one lowered...now I have this 3:1 ratio. Is there a way to individually lower a landing strut?

Damn Kerbal engineering...
No, you can\'t individually lower them, you can only lower them in the symmetric groups that they were placed with. Have you tried right-clicking on them to lower the legs?
that worked, I didn\'t know you could right click on it

that worked, I didn\'t know you could right click on it

Right-clicking will give you statistics and options about:

- Landing legs

- Fuel tanks

- Jet engines

- Crew hatches

Right-clicking will only give you information about:

- Crew-able parts

- EVApack
